main.coverTitle: Alexi And Vakhtang Matchavariani Charity Foundation
main.missionContent1:
Support of young  Composers and performers of exceptional talent.
Establishment of the International Composers Competition of Alexi Matchavariani. 

 Popularisation of Georgian Music in Georgia and Abroad.
Organisation of professional musical events and their support.
Establishment of the International Youth Symphony Orchestra.
main.missionContent2:
Establishment of the musical Festival.
Restoration of damaged  musical Scores of Georgian Composers.
Restoration of Audio & Video samples of old Georgian musical 
masterpieces.
Revival of forgotten Georgian musical masterpieces.
Presentation of unknown musical masterpieces in Georgia.
Connection of Georgian and foreign young musicians via Music.

sample.title: Concourse  Name
sample.h3: Tasks To Be Executed Over A Fixed Period
sample.content:
A foundation (also a charitable foundation) is a category of nonprofit organization or charitable trust that typically provides funding and support for other charitable organizations through grants, but may also engage directly in charitable activities. Foundations include public charitable foundations, such as community foundations, and private foundation, which are typically endowed by an individual or family. However, the term "foundation" may also be used by organizations that are not involved in public grantmaking.
Legal entities existing under the status of "foundations" have a wide diversity of structures and purposes. Nevertheless, there are some common structural elements.
